project.name: LT4
description: Modified AWS Step Functions to handle multiple products and historical data, improved messaging with SQS for better transaction processing and reduced latency.
Enhanced system validations using Step Functions and Lambda, developed unit tests with pyTest, and integrated Jenkins for streamlined CI/CD and automated deployments.

project.name: Smart Connect
description: Migrated a Mule monolithic architecture to a scalable Spring Boot multiserver setup, implementing Kafka-based messaging for real-time task notifications and transaction tracking.
Developed a token-based throttling component for rate-limiting and used Spring Batch for efficient ERP data processing, ensuring memory management and seamless data migration.
Created comprehensive API specs with Swagger, mentored junior developers, and improved test reliability using Mockito for complex dependency testing.

project.name: TaxoAnalyzer
description: Developed REST APIs in Node.js, integrated SQL for data retrieval, and built dynamic Vue.js components for campaign insights.
Implemented Vuex for state management, ensuring seamless UI interactions and efficient data handling.

project.name: Talent Connect
description: Developed REST APIs, implemented an email notification system for approvals, and integrated Elasticsearch for advanced search functionality.
Built and customized web screens using ReactJS with pagination, leveraging Redux for efficient state management.

project.name: Hypex
description: Migrated a monolithic system to a scalable multi-server architecture, optimizing costs and performance.
Implemented Kafka for data streaming, integrated Debezium with PostgreSQL and Redis for efficient data replication, and optimized query performance using indexing.
Developed and optimized backend components using Spring Boot, JWT authentication, and AWS Lambda for batch processing via SQS.
Integrated AWS CloudWatch and Splunk for real-time monitoring, built WebSocket-based session updates, and contributed to UI development using ReactJS.
